settings.hero_eyebrow: Born Resistance is not a Choice, It's Our Story
settings.hero_subtitle: Purpose-driven apparel for those who carry the flame of liberation.
settings.roots_title: Culture, craft, and courage woven together.
settings.roots_copy: Born Resistance celebrates the unbreakable spirit of our communities. Every design honors heritage, resistance, and the voices that carried us here. This is apparel for the fearless – stories stitched into every seam.
settings.timeless_eyebrow: TIMELESS PIECES FOR A FEARLESS GENERATION
settings.timeless_title: Signature drops that honor legacy and ignite the future.
settings.callout_title: Drop updates, exclusive releases, and stories from the frontlines.
settings.callout_copy: Get first access to our next release and learn more about the movements we stand with. This is more than merch – it is a message.
settings.voices_title: Wearing the message. Sharing the mission.
settings.footer_cta_title: Born Resistance is a call to remember, to rise, and to move together.

settings.title: Legacy Capsule
settings.copy: Elevated essentials inspired by the ancestors who paved the way. Soft fabrics. Sharp silhouettes.

settings.title: Roots Reimagined
settings.copy: Bold prints, unapologetic color, and iconography that centers the people. Made to be worn loud.

settings.title: Unity Uniform
settings.copy: Statement layers for those leading the march. Built with purpose, crafted for endurance.

settings.quote: This brand is a reminder that resistance is legacy.
Bold, unapologetic, and built for the work.
Every drop tells a story worth wearing.
